binaryPath.description: Path to Liquefy CLI binary or script (defaults to LIQUEFY_OPENCLAW_BIN env var or `liquefy`).

workspace.description: Default OpenClaw workspace path. Defaults to ~/.openclaw.

vaultOut.description: Default vault output directory (required for scan/apply if not supplied by tool input).

requireSecureByDefault.description: If true, apply runs pass --secure and require LIQUEFY_SECRET.
